title: [GAMEPLAY] Skillshots completely BORKED- Game-breaking
body:
Skillshots on many champions going 180 degrees in the opposite direction when used in succession after another skill, 100% repro rate

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLGlWYluAHk&feature=youtu.be

replies.body: I had a Caitlyn skillshot fly somewhere between 45 and 90 degrees offset to where I had placed it. It didn't cost us the game, but I was scratching my head afterward.
